file_content.text: This... this isn't over. I'm not dead yet!
I won't let you win. I won't let the Empire's shadow fall over Alderaan!
Your fellow nobles can decide your fate.
You will stand trial.
So be it. Let the battlefield change--I will fight to protect Alderaan from the Empire's filth to my last breath, just as I always have.
So ends the reign of Bouris Ulgo.
Your life ends now. [Kill him.]
For Alderaan!
And here we are. It's just as I predicted.
The real masters behind House Thul--the claws of the Sith Empire--come to claim the throne of Alderaan for their own evil ends.
A mere tool of the Sith Empire, just like the beasts in House Thul--sent to wrench the throne of Alderaan away from those who rightfully possess it.
I have no patience for your self-righteous prattle, "king."
Silence, usurper.
Of course not. If you cared at all for the good of others, you wouldn't be here.
You should save your breath--you may not have much more of it.
Spare me your blathering.
If you think that I will fail now, then you are gravely mistaken.
Go ahead and waste time blabbing, pal--I get paid by the hour.
Talkative, aren't you?
You should know better than anyone how common regime changes can be.
Better learn to accept it.
Fool. Don't you have any idea what you're trying to do here? What those monsters have put you up to?
Your claim to the throne is no more legitimate than House Thul's.
You're a hypocrite.
Wrong. Alderaan is everything to me. I've spent my entire life fighting to keep Alderaan safe from the likes of you!
Is the king afraid?
The righteous have nothing to fear from bloodthirsty thugs like you.
I was the only one strong enough to do what was necessary. The people of this world deserve a leader who will defend them!
I will not surrender this throne for you, or for anyone else. Only I can keep it safe. Only I can protect Alderaan!
Let's end this. [Attack]
Surrender now, and you can face a just trial.
You don't have to die here.
I will not be tried when my only crime is defending the people of Alderaan.
That's some big talk.
I believe I've tolerated your intrusion long enough.
To arms, men! Destroy these intruders--defend your king!
Destroy this assassin, men. Defend your king--defend Alderaan!
